posts.post_content:
Thank you for looking and if you have any questions please email me at: [url]mpeich@comcast.net[/url].

An email, indicating that you want a card, takes precedence over PMs or posts in this thread.

Payment by check is preferred and if you are a repeat buyer the card will be sent immediately. New buyer checks will have to clear before the card is sent. If you wish to use PayPal we will split the 3% fee.

Shipping/handling is $5.00 for insured first class.

Enjoy the cards!
Mike
